title: Stop with these types of missions.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/0bbd08871d0a87d792e0a7a22a786ca1.png

I don't _want_ to premade in a group of 5. I have one person on my Friends List because I hate people. Stop making me work with other people for things. Or, at least allow them to be done in co-op vs ai.

replies.body:
I agree with this.

1. Missions should be personal, and not luck based, _(fyi dragon spawns are random and its just lucky or unlucky if you happen to get the right spawns for that other mission)_
2. Missions should be completable for everyone, and not everyone easily has access to premade 5 groups. I for example have tons of people in my friends list, a lot add me for my Anime name, not to mention 1-3 irl friends that are nearly _always_ on when I'm on, and I still have a rough time trying to get a premade 5, _(tried all last night and still couldn't get one game)_ so I dread to think how hard it is for people who like yourself, are more selective about who they play with.

It was hard enough getting star Guardian 5's, I had to play for literally hours and hours before accumulating enough people for a 5, and even then we spent most of our time losing, so we only completed a few missions. And now, not only does it have to be in a premade 5 in PvP but it's for almost no reward, AND its an off-meta team, so you cant just pick up randos to team up with, because no one wants to do it _(and rightly so)_.

The dragon one didn't bother me too much because no matter what, it was one or the other and getting dragons is pretty much common sense. But, I agree. missions are personal and treating them as if they aren't is actually _really_ annoying. I mean, this isn't 2009 - 2011 when everyone had 30+ friends online at once. I no longer add people because a) they get annoying b) they ask to be carried or c) they're actually awful.

That's not even going into those that have jobs, families, or other commitments that chew time for grouping. It's hard to find groups that want to do this. It's even worse that the mission requires you to play an off-meta teamcomp that most people won't do. No ADC will turn most people off instantly.

That's not even adding onto the fact that it's in a PvP mode and means it needs to be done in normals or ranked. I wouldn't be upset if it could be done in a co-op vs ai. Better yet, let's not make premade events.
Yeah what if you don't have any friends? Riot thinking their players have social lives?

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TOEMWbge,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-03T10:47:35.975+0000)
>
> Yeah what if you don't have any friends? Riot thinking their players have social lives?

I have no friends tbh. I don't add people, no matter what. I have denied friend requests from high elo players - talking master+. C'mon, Riot, Missions should all be solo.

the comments on this page says it all

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot

and they want people to pay $15 for these missions.

what i want to know is if not being able to complete this mission because of its dumb requirements is going to stop someone who paid $15 from unlocking all of the ashe skin related things (because thats essentially what you paid for)? basically, will those 5 tokens actually matter or are people going to be slightly short?

if the 5 tokens are essentially meaningless then why even make these "throw away" missions? surely people at riot must realise that the incentives need to be much greater if they want people to group up. eg. xp/ip/be boosts while in a group.

The 5 tokens won't matter to get the Gold Ashe. I've got a smurf with the full mission pass. And you'll have a fair amount of tokens left over. But then if I want to get that and the border, I might need those 5 tokens (haven't done the calculation yet). Right now. Anyone with the mission pass will be able to unlock the Worlds Orb upon completing all of this weeks mission.

ok i found this. 

"Completing ALL of the Missions will get you 175 Tokens for free. The Master Pass will give you access to an additional 560 Tokens for a total of 735 Tokens."

so it seems you won't miss out on anything other than 15 blue essence by not completing it. 

next to no value, high effort mission. why does it even exist?

Isn't Riot doing this because they're heavily focused on making and keeping league a team orientated game? Which you queue up with friends and get rewarded more based of this? 
i.e party ip bonuses and missions favouring those with premades.

I do find the missions annoying but I mean it was a challenge completing some of them and I guess that adds to the element of a 'mission'.

I am genuinely confused as to why this matters. Yes it might be a little unfair if you don't have friends willing to help you get it done, but nothing you earn from the missions will improve how you play the game. If you can't do the missions then just don't, because you are not missing out on exclusive rewards that help. The whole point of the loot system was to rewards players from playing the game despite losing profit from it so I don't think they care if some people are unhappy that they can maximise the amount of free stuff they get.

> The whole point of the loot system was to rewards players from playing the game despite losing profit from it so I don't think they care if some people are unhappy that they can maximise the amount of free stuff they get.



Riot is a very player friendly company, that can not be denied in any way!

But make no mistake, absolutely nothing they do is done without the potential for profit!

Skins and other items have obvious profit: we pay them, and they make money.
But other things such as champ/item reworks may look like it's out of the kindness of their heart, but mainly it's done to keep players interested/appeased in the game.

Nothing ruins a game more than stagnation!
League would hemorrhage players if the meta never shifted, it would lose tons of people if Riot didn't listen to player feedback about balance, if the map still looked ugly, if the client was outdated.

So all the updates while they seem free and fun are actually just bait to keep players interested in the game, and so keep their customers from leaving.
The loot chests are the same, they do give us free stuff, and thats great for us!!
But they do it to keep players interested in the game, not out of the kindness of their hearts.

Riot is a fantastic company! I'm not saying they aren't! They are probably one of (info the best) company I have ever seen,.
But they are a company and their main goal is making money.

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Dunk,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TOEMWbge,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-10-04T06:49:40.592+0000)
>
>despite losing profit from it 

please explain how riot "loses profit".
While I agree with this, let's be honest, Rito probably only gives 5 tokens for this mission cause they know people won't give a shit and leave it undone

Yeah, I don't like that it forced you to 5-man. 2-man or 3-man should be the very most. The mission itself could be done playing a handful of ARAM games or tryharding a Normal with 5 melees.

I think Riot restricted it to 5-man because they know going a Bruiser or something in place of an ADC is basically trolling in Season 7.

True basically you are asked to play without an ad carry but it is a just alternative way to express it with fancy words
Melee champs in bot lane are stupid, you will eventually get out cs-ed by the enemy adc because you can't come close to the minions and last hit them. It then depends on whether your top lane or mid lane can carry or not

For both this and the Star Guardian missions its been extremely annoying. People dont just add randoms as they did in the early days of the game, and if they do they want a carry in ranked or something.

Ive had to jump around a million different League related servers trying to find an off chance that there are 4 other OCE based players and that they all want to try for the missions. On the r/League subreddit discord theres maybe like 3 posts about OCE a day, at any random time, and OCE chats are limited to the "Other" server group. I really shouldnt have to do that, or spam people i play with/against to try and get a group for the mission.

The game needs a group finder.

Exactly. With no group finding tools, how the heck are you meant to do this? I don't use Discord. I don't use TeamSpeak. I don't post on Reddit. Why am I being hindered for not using things that aren't in the game client?

Doesn't help you need to win with an off-meta teamcomp, too. I know a few people that can only play ranged champs.

You want me to play a clown Fiesta comp with 5 people when im lucky to have 1 person online at times for 5 measly tokens.

No thanks.

I tend to agree. With Invasion it made sense, since it's a strictly PvE mode, but not with Worlds-SR. Especially not when you're excluding a very significant portion of the champion pool (62 champs, or ~45%, by my count) from all 5 players on the team.
